typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		EmpCNTRY as string,
		Deptid as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> empsource
source(output(
		Deptid as string,
		DepartName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsource
ModifyColumns1, deptsource join(empsource@Deptid == deptsource@Deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joindata
empsource derive(EmpCNTRY = upper(EmpCNTRY)) ~> ModifyColumns1
Joindata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Empdept_data'],
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		EmpName,
		EmpCNTRY,
		DepartName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outputdata
